item.title: Oil prices attempt to hold ground after Friday slump
item.description: Oil futures attempted to find their footing Monday, after ending last week with a rout that accompanied a steep selloff in U.S. stocks.

item.title: ‘I’ve opened a hornet’s nest’: My mother-in-law lists my husband as beneficiary on her $1 million IRA. But her will says otherwise. Which wins?
item.description: “All of this is causing a lot of turmoil in the family. Does her will trump the IRA beneficiary?”

item.title: Why the Apollo economist who coined ‘no-landing’ now sees intensifying risks to the U.S. economy
item.description: Policy uncertainty is no friend to animal spirits, says a leading economist.

item.title: One of my 3 children passed away — and left behind a child. I also have a second grandkid. How do I divide my estate?
item.description: “Twenty-five percent each does not seem fair given that one child and grandchild could inherit half of my estate.”

item.title: My mother, 63, inherited $100,000. Is she too old to invest in the stock market? What should she do with it?
item.description: “Are the only options to create a CD ladder or leave it in a high-interest savings account?”
